name: Puss in Boots: The Last Wish
name_cn: 穿靴子的猫：最后的愿望
summary: Puss in Boots discovers that his passion for adventure has taken its toll: he has burned through eight of his nine lives. Puss sets out on an epic journey to find the mythical Last Wish and restore his nine lives.
info:
